decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, any windows or rooflights at first floor level and above in the side elevations/roof slopes shall be constructed so that no part of the framework less than 1.7m above finished floor level shall be openable. Any part below that level shall be fitted with and permanently retained in obscure glazing to a minimum of level 3 on the standard scale. Any film used to achieve the requisite obscurity level shall be non-perishable, tamper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to result in obscurity to level 3.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out and thereafter retained/maintained in accordance with the Planning Fire Safety Strategy dated February 2023 unless otherwise first agreed in writing.Reason: To ensure the highest standards of fire safety in accordance with Policy D12(A) of the London Plan (2021).
description: Demolition of conservatory and erection of single storey side and rear extension and conversion of garage, erection of rear piggyback roof extension, raising roof height and installation of 8no. side rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
